name: Sailplane Flight Simulator
description:
Fly a realistic a glider using ridge lift and thermals to get to the goals, or free flight.

Please consider donating to a help the deveopment!

CONTROLS

Roll: left / right arrows

Pitch: up / down arrows

Yaw: a / d

Cam1: z

Cam2: x

Cam3: c

Developed in Unity.
